snippet.title: Where Wind Becomes Quiet - Game Trailer
snippet.description:
A narrative adventure game set in the Soviet atmosphere. You play as a writer suffering from amnesia and trying to sort out his past. Recognition is what he has been striving for his whole life. But it turns out that success becomes too heavy a burden.

Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1555130/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/miket_prod
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/miket_prod/
Discord: https://discord.gg/wc4saZgT

#WhereWindBecomesQuiet #GameTrailer #Indiegame
